TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PackageProperties extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents the core properties of a .

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Category { get; set; }
.property instance string Category

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the category of the .
Docs.value: The category of the content that is contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Category value is typically used as part of the application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] to create labels for navigation controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ContentStatus { get; set; }
.property instance string ContentStatus

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the status of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Example ContentStatus values include "Draft", "Reviewed", and "Final".

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ContentType { get; set; }
.property instance string ContentType

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the type of content that is contained in the .
Docs.value: The type of content that is contained in the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Example ContentType values include "Whitepaper", "Security Bulletin", and "Exam".
This ContentType property is distinct from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] content types as defined in RFC 2616.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Nullable<DateTime> Created { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> Created

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the date and time the was created.
Docs.value: The date and time the was initially created.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Creator { get; set; }
.property instance string Creator

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that identifies the individual or entity that created the and its content.
Docs.value: The individual or entity that created the and its content.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Description { get; set; }
.property instance string Description

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a description of the content contained in the .
Docs.value: A description of the content contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, table of contents, reference to a graphical representation of content, or a free-text account of the content.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties>. The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> in an unusable state. After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> references. This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

.property instance string Identifier

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that unambiguously identifies the and its content.
Docs.value: A value that unambiguously identifies the and its content.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Keywords { get; set; }
.property instance string Keywords

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that define a delimited set of keywords to support searching and indexing the and its content.
Docs.value: A delimited set of keywords to support searching and indexing the and content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Keywords property typically contains a list of terms that are not available elsewhere in <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties>.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Revision { get; set; }
.property instance string Revision

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the revision number of the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Revision property indicates the number of changed saves or revisions.
The application is responsible for updating the Revision property value after each revision.
